Answer: A: A person in a hot dog costume holding a Spirit Halloween sign, which he jokes is a “weiner dog” telling him to go in.

The speaker mentions seeing a person dressed as a hot dog holding a sign that says "Spirit Halloween," making a pun on the word "weiner dog." This prompts him to go into the store.
